author: Aznbeat (noreply@blogger.com)
title: This Week in Esports [January 31st - February 6th]
text:
Following the third week of regional leagues, we're back with  This Week in Esports! 
[ Warning : This post contains event  spoilers !] 
Continue reading for current LCS & regional standings, team & player news, roster updates, and more! 
Current Standings: The brackets and standings below are up to date as of  Monday, February 6th  and, as always,  VODs can be found here  and check out the various links to see advanced scheduling for the various regional leagues!

[NA] LCS: Standings after  Week 3 : Top Three Cloud9 -  Matches [6-0] FlyQuest  -  Matches [5-1] TSM  -  Matches [5-1] 2017 NA LCS Spring Split Week Three Infographic NA LCS Week 3 Highlights: 
NA LCS Tonight - Week 3 Schedule   -  LoL eSports  // Esports Wikis 2017 NA LCS Spring Split: Team Schedules: 
[EU] LCS: Standings after  Week 3 : Group A   Top 2: G2 Esports -  [4-0] Misfits  -  [3-1] Group B  Top 2: Unicorns of Love  -  [4-0] H2K  -  [3-1] Post Game Lobby: EULCS Spring Week 3 Recap   Schedule   -  LoL eSports  // Esports Wikis 
[Korea] LCK: Standings after  Week 3 : Top Three KT Rolster: 4W - 0L SK Telecom T1:  4W - 0L Samsung Galaxy:  3W - 1L Schedule/Teams/Standings -  Esports Wiki 
[China] LPL: Standings after  Week 1 : Group A  Top 2 I MAY : 2W - 0L Snake Esports : 1W - 0L Group B  Top 2 Edward Gaming:  2W - 0L QG Reapers:  1W - 0L Schedule/Teams/Standings -  Esports Wikis 
[TW/HK/MO] LMS:   Standings after  Week 2 : Top Four: Flash Wolves: 3W - 0L Hong Kong Esports:  2W - 0L J Team:  2W - 1L Fire Ball:  1W - 1L Schedule/Teams/Standings -  Esports Wikis 
Team, Player, Event & Organization News 
Riot & LCS: Tons of Photos from first three weeks of LCS available on the  lol esports flickr! A multitude of regional esports team summoner icons are  available through April 30th ! These bundles are available individually and as a part of larger bundles. 
KR Our 2016 World Champions are streaming! The SKT T1 team has officially started streaming on Twitch!  Follow the team twitter  for more information and stream announcements. Faker During his stream on Februrary 6th, Faker set a new twitch.tv record for the most concurrent viewers on an indivvidual's channel with 245,100 viewers!  Bang Sky Blank       
Features and Spotlights While the PTL show will not be continuing this year, several PTL shows and segments continue -check out the most recent editions of MIC CHECK, THE PENTA, and THIS OR THAT!
MIC CHECK: Episode 2 THE PENTA: Episode 2 THIS OR THAT!: Inappropriate Comments, suggestions, concerns of the heart? Leave us feedback on TWIES in the comments below!
